subject: Hoaxes and Pranks
Football
lead_paragraph: Linebacker Manti Te’o, a former star at Notre Dame, says he has moved on from the bizarre hoax involving a fake dead girlfriend that had made him a national punch line.
snippet: Linebacker Manti Te’o, a former star at Notre Dame, says he has moved on from the bizarre hoax involving a fake dead girlfriend that had made him a national punch line.
